post:
Dear LET community,

I heard you when you were asking for 100Mbits network on our <a href="https://express.ikoula.com/en/public-cloud">Public Cloud</a> offer.
I am pleased to announce from now on the 100 Mbits router does not longer require a billable upgrade. 

When you will deploy a 100Mbits router it will be included in the vm price.
It now works as it was working for the 10 Mbits network.

nb : 200 mbits is former 100 mbits price etcetera...

nb2: This does not apply to singapore zone.

As usual i will answer any questions.
